subject: Re: Running a
msgSnippet: Thanks Mark that fixed it. Sylvain. ... junit/runner/excluded.properties file ... through ... the ... an ... cannot ...
messageBody:
Thanks Mark that fixed it.
Sylvain.

--- In junit@y..., Mark Meyers <markm@m...> wrote:
> Might be a variation on the age old classloader problem.
> (reloaded classes are different classes)
> Try adding "excluded.6=org.*" to your
junit/runner/excluded.properties file
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: sylvainstg [mailto:sylvainstg@h...]
> > Sent: dinsdag 26 februari 2002 16:36
> > To: junit@y...
> > Subject: [junit] Running a
> >
> >
> >
> > Hi all,
> >
> > I am trying to run junit.awtui.TestRunner with a TestCase class,
> > according to the documentation it will find the test* methods
through
> > introspections. The class indeed as a dozen test* methods and
the
> > TestRunner sees them. However, it fails at initialization with
an
> > the exception regarding Logs.
> >
> > I suspect I am having a versioning problem of some kind but
cannot
> > figure it out.
> >
> > The relevent portions of the classpath would be:
> >
> > E:\java\commons-logging-1.0\commons-logging.jar;
> > E:\java\jakarta-log4j-1.2beta3\log4j-1.2beta3.jar;
> > E:\java\junit3.7\junit.jar;
> >
> > The stack trace is:
> >
> > java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError:
> > org.apache.commons.logging.LogConfigurationException:
> > java.lang.ClassCastException:
> > org.apache.commons.logging.impl.LogFactoryImpl
> > at org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory.newFactory
> > (LogFactory.java:497)
> > at org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory.getFactory
> > (LogFactory.java:350)
> > at org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory.getLog
> > (LogFactory.java:400)
> > at org.apache.axis.configuration.FileProvider.<clinit>
> > (Unknown Source)
> > at
> >
org.apache.axis.configuration.DefaultEngineConfigurationFactory.getCli
> > entEngineConfig(Unknown Source)
> > at org.apache.axis.client.Service.<init>(Unknown Source)
> > at com.cognos.developer.ContentManagerServiceLocator.<init>
> > (ContentManagerServiceLocator.java:10)
> > at
> >
com.cognos.developer.ContentManagerServiceTestCase.test1ContentManager
> > ServicePortTypeAdd(ContentManagerServiceTestCase.java:17)
> >
> >
> > Any help much appreciated.
> > Sylvain.
> >
> >
